trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around December 1st 2008
Summary: Object moved slowly toward southeast,stoped momentarly,reversed course asn stoped.
divs: Sighting DetailsErie looking oval shaped object with greenish looking white lights in the center of the craft.I'am a 45 yr old goverment officer,my mother and I were out shopping and were on our way home when I looked up and saw an object that seemed to be hoovering in the sky a short distance away.I know my planes and helecopters and this was neither.We drove about a mile and a half and caught up with it.Upon closer inspection we could see that it had an oval shape to it,with greenish whit lights in the center.It seemed to reverse course as though it knew we were veiwing it.We were excited at first but then a little panic set in,it was wierd,I backed my jeep up out of the dead end street and left the scene,I even ran a red light,it no traffic at the time.I was always a believer but seeing this reinforced my belief.The whole event lasted about 13 min.
